entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -27.4°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 14.5 km

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
